          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["Value | Description |\n—– | ———– |"],
              ["<hue>", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | specified in degrees around the color wheel (without units), where 0° is red, 60° is yellow, 120° is green, 180° is cyan, 240° is blue, 300° is magenta, and 360° is red |"
              ],
              ["<saturation>", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | percentage where 0% is fully desaturated (grayscale) and 100% is fully saturated (vividly colored) |"
              ],
              ["<lightness>", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | percentage where 0% is fully black and 100% is fully white |"
              ],
              ["<alpha>", [["c"]]],
              [
                " | a number from 0 - 1 where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque |"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
      }
    },
    "space": {}
